info.name: BANK ACCOUNT
info.description: The collection comprise of requests to create account + virtual card, retrieve created accounts and to decrypt encrypted data.

request.description:
The API endpoint creates a new bank account and virtual card.

### Request Body

- firstName (string): The first name of the account holder.
    
- surname (string): The surname of the account holder.
    
- email (string): The email address of the account holder.
    
- phoneNumber (string): The phone number of the account holder.
    
- dateOfBirth (string): The date of birth of the account holder.
    

### Response

The response is in JSON format and includes the following fields:

- account (object): Details of the created account, including first name, surname, email, phone number, date of birth, account number, creation timestamp, and other metadata.
    
- card (object): Details of the virtual card associated with the account, including card number, CVV, expiry date, creation timestamp, and other metadata.
    
- encryptedData (object): Encrypted data for phone number, date of birth, card number, CVV, and expiry date, including encryption details such as IV and authentication tag.
    

Example response:

``` json
{
  "account": {
    "firstName": "",
    "surname": "",
    "email": "",
    "phoneNumber": "",
    "phoneIV": "",
    "phoneAuthTag": "",
    "dateOfBirthIV": "",
    "dateOfBirthAuthTag": "",
    "dateOfBirth": "",
    "accountNumber": "",
    "_id": "",
    "createdAt": "",
    "__v": 0,
    "decryptedPhoneNumber": "",
    "decryptedDateOfBirth": ""
  },
  "card": {
    "accountNumber": "",
    "cardNumber": "",
    "cardIV": "",
    "cardAuthTag": "",
    "cvv": "",
    "cvvIV": "",
    "cvvAuthTag": "",
    "expiryDate": "",
    "expiryDateIV": "",
    "expiryDateAuthTag": "",
    "_id": "",
    "createdAt": "",
    "__v": 0,
    "decryptedCardNumber": "",
    "decryptedCvv": "",
    "decryptedExpiryDate": ""
  },
  "encryptedData": {
    "phoneNumber": {
      "encrypted": "",
      "iv": "",
      "authTag": ""
    },
    "dateOfBirth": {
      "encrypted": "",
      "iv": "",
      "authTag": ""
    },
    "cardNumber": {
      "encrypted": "",
      "iv": "",
      "authTag": ""
    },
    "cvv": {
      "encrypted": "",
      "iv": "",
      "authTag": ""
    },
    "expiryDate": {
      "encrypted": "",
      "iv": "",
      "authTag": ""
    }
  }
}

 ```

This endpoint allows you to create a new bank account and virtual card.

#### Request Body

- `firstName` (string): The first name of the account holder.
    
- `surname` (string): The surname of the account holder.
    
- `email` (string): The email address of the account holder.
    
- `phoneNumber` (string): The phone number of the account holder.
    
- `dateOfBirth` (string): The date of birth of the account holder.
    

#### Response

Upon a successful creation, the response will have a status code of 201 and a JSON body containing the newly created account and card details along with encrypted data for phone number, date of birth, card number, CVV, and expiry date.

The endpoint retrieves a list of all accounts from the virtual bank and virtual card system.

The response returns a JSON array with the following fields for each account:

- _id (String): The unique identifier for the account.
    
- firstName (String): The first name of the account holder.
    
- surname (String): The surname of the account holder.
    
- email (String): The email address associated with the account.
    
- phoneNumber (String): The encrypted phone number of the account holder.
    
- phoneIV (String): Initialization Vector (IV) for the encrypted phone number.
    
- phoneAuthTag (String): Authentication tag for the encrypted phone number.
    
- dateOfBirthIV (String): Initialization Vector (IV) for the encrypted date of birth.
    
- dateOfBirthAuthTag (String): Authentication tag for the encrypted date of birth.
    
- dateOfBirth (String): The encrypted date of birth of the account holder.
    
- accountNumber (String): The account number associated with the account.
    
- createdAt (String): The date and time when the account was created.
    
- __v (Number): Version key for the account document.
    
- fullname (String): The full name of the account holder.
    
- decryptedPhoneNumber (String): The decrypted phone number of the account holder.
    
- decryptedDateOfBirth (String): The decrypted date of birth of the account holder.
    
- card (Object): An object containing details of the associated card, including:
    
    - _id (String): The unique identifier for the card.
        
    - accountNumber (String): The account number associated with the card.
        
    - cardNumber (String): The encrypted card number.
        
    - cardIV (String): Initialization Vector (IV) for the encrypted card number.
        
    - cardAuthTag (String): Authentication tag for the encrypted card number.
        
    - cvv (String): The encrypted CVV of the card.
        
    - cvvIV (String): Initialization Vector (IV) for the encrypted CVV.
        
    - cvvAuthTag (String): Authentication tag for the encrypted CVV.
        
    - expiryDate (String): The encrypted expiry date of the card.
        
    - expiryDateIV (String): Initialization Vector (IV) for the encrypted expiry date.
        
    - expiryDateAuthTag (String): Authentication tag for the encrypted expiry date.
        
    - createdAt (String): The date and time when the card was created.
        
    - __v (Number): Version key for the card document.
        
    - decryptedCard (Object): An object containing decrypted details of the card, including:
        
        - cardNumber (String): The decrypted card number.
            
        - cvv (String): The decrypted CVV.
            
        - expiryDate (String): The decrypted expiry date.
            

The response of this request can be documented as a JSON schema based on the provided fields and their data types.
